amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency by $50 million and to reduce funding for Weapons Activities by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency account by 50 million and reduce the Weapons Activities account by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 241 (Roll no. 316).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 241 (Roll no. 316).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Cohen.
